articles.title: Patagotitan: Colossal dinosaur heading for UK display - BBC
articles.description: A cast of what may be the biggest ever dinosaur - 70-tonne Patagotitan - will go on show in London.
articles.content:
A replica of what could have been the largest animal ever to walk on land is coming to London in the New Year.
